rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance hall with open space leading to living areas, designed to receive the natural light and energy as per Vastu principles.

Open-plan living room and kitchen combined. Minimalist design ensuring ample space for wheelchair maneuverability. Natural ventilation through strategically placed openings. The area is positioned in alignment with Vastu guidelines, ensuring the main entrance faces north-east.

One-bedroom unit on the ground floor designed with a clear circulation path and accessibility in mind. Includes built-in storage to maintain minimalistic style. Bedrooms are placed towards the north-west following Vastu guidelines.
Accessible bathroom with grab bars, slip-resistant flooring, and ample space for wheelchair users. Positioned on the ground floor for ease of access.

openings.description: Main entrance door located at the north-east corner as per Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow.
Large windows integrated into living and kitchen areas to maximize natural light and ventilation. Placed strategically in accordance with Vastu guidelines.

rooms.description: Second bedroom on the upper floor designed for a quiet, private space. Accessibility is provided via an interior wheelchair ramp connecting to the lower level if required.
Additional study or office area created with flexible design allowing it to be used as a home workspace. Minimalist design ensures clear lines of sight and accessibility features.

openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible staircase with an integrated ramp option for the upper floor access, ensuring compliance with local building norms.
Windows designed to provide natural light and cross ventilation while adhering to Vastu principles.
